nodes.label: message
nodes.text: Good morning, Person1,    I had reported to my work that I tested positive for covid since I had gone into the office. Now to be able to go back in again I need a note clearing me. I don go in often, but I do like having the option on my good days. :-)     Would you mind writing me a note for work saying that I had tested positive for covid MM/DD/YYYY, the 10 day quarantine of symptom on set has passed and am no longer contagious or whatever the correct wording would be. You can send it to me in here or email, address@email.com. No rush, at your convenience. Thank you, Person2.
